meta.title: Immediate Need - 24 Hour Support | Barringtons Funeral Services
meta.description: We're here for you 24/7 when you need immediate funeral support. Compassionate guidance through every step. Call 0151 928 1625 anytime.
meta.keywords: immediate funeral need Liverpool, 24 hour funeral support, emergency funeral services, death registration Liverpool, what to do when someone dies

intro.title: When Someone Dies: Your First Steps
intro.subtitle: We understand this is an overwhelming time. Take a deep breath – you don't have to do everything at once, and we're here to help you through each step.

steps.title: Take a Moment
steps.description: If the death has just occurred, there's no immediate rush. Take time to be with your loved one if you wish. When you're ready, move to the next steps.

steps.title: Call for Help
steps.description: Call us first at 0151 928 1625 – we have a funeral director available at all times. We'll guide you through everything that needs to happen and take as much of the burden as possible, allowing you time to collect your thoughts.

steps.title: Medical Certification
steps.description: A doctor will need to certify the death. Since September 2024:
list: The doctor who treated your loved one will complete a Medical Certificate of Cause of Death
A Medical Examiner will review this and call you to discuss any concerns
Once approved, the information goes to the Registrar

steps.title: Register the Death
steps.description: You'll need to make an appointment at the Register Office. Don't worry if you can't do this immediately.
steps.subtitle: What to bring (if available):
list: Birth certificate or passport of your loved one
Details about their occupation and pension

steps.title: Special Circumstances
steps.description: If the death was unexpected, sudden, or occurred in certain circumstances, the Coroner may be involved. This is routine procedure – we'll support you through this process if needed.

remember.title: Remember:
points: You don't have to remember everything – we'll remind you what's needed
It's okay to ask for help from family and friends
remember.highlight: Your first call to us is often the hardest. Once you've made it, we'll be with you every step of the way.

cta.title: We're Here to Help
cta.subtitle: Our experienced team is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week to provide immediate assistance and support.

phone.title: 24 Hour Support Line
phone.description: Available any time, day or night

email.title: Email Support
email.description: We'll respond as quickly as possible
